actorTechnicalName.title: Actor Technical Name
actorTechnicalName.description: The technical name of the Actor (e.g., 'apify/web-scraper')

githubLink.title: GitHub Repository Link
githubLink.description: The GitHub repository URL where the actor.json is located

githubToken.title: GitHub Token
githubToken.description: GitHub personal access token with repo permissions

redashToken.title: Redash API Key
redashToken.description: Redash API key for dataset validation

generateViews.title: Generate Views
generateViews.description: Generate view schemas for the Actor (Overview and context-specific views). If false, existing views from actor.json will be moved to dataset_schema.json

daysBack.title: Days Back
daysBack.description: Number of days back to query for datasets (1-30)

maximumResults.title: Maximum Results
maximumResults.description: Maximum number of datasets to validate (1-50)

minimumResults.title: Minimum Results
minimumResults.description: Minimum number of results required for validation (1+)

runsPerUser.title: Runs Per User
runsPerUser.description: Number of runs per user to consider (1+)
